pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:0.5: 29. The training rule on letting the time expire
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.1: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.2: a family that was supporting the nun Thullanandā said to her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.3: “If we’re able, Venerable, we’ll give robe-cloth to the Sangha of nuns.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.4: Just then the nuns who had completed the rainy-season residence had gathered to distribute robe-cloth.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.6: “Please wait, Venerables. The Sangha is expecting more cloth.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.9: She then went to that family and said to them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.10: “Please give the robe-cloth to the Sangha of nuns.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.11: “We’re sorry, but we’re not able to give robe-cloth to the Sangha.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.12: Thullanandā told the nuns what had happened.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.13: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.14: “How could Venerable Thullanandā allow the robe season to expire because of an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.15: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.18: “… How could the nun Thullanandā do this?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.19: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.20: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.21.1: ‘If a nun lets the robe season expire because of an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.1.6: they have said, “If we’re able, then we’ll give, then we’ll act.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.1.8: for one who has not participated in the robe-making procedure, it is the last month of the rainy season; for one who has participated in the robe-making procedure, it is the five month period.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.1.10: for one who has not participated in the robe-making procedure, if she goes beyond the last day of the rainy season, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.1.11: For one who has participated in the robe-making procedure, if she goes beyond the day on which the robe-making season ends, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.2.1: If it is an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth, and she perceives it as such, and she lets the robe season expire, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.2.2: If it is an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth, but she is unsure of it, and she lets the robe season expire, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.2.3: If it is an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth, but she does not perceive it as such, and she lets the robe season expire, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.2.4: If it is not an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth, but she perceives it as such, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.2.5: If it is not an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.2.6: If it is not an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth, and she does not perceive it as such, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.3.2: if she hinders it after demonstrating a benefit;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.3.4: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.3.5: The ninth training rule is finished.
